mapper.update: REPLACE z_website_param(id, name, roll_content, kf_url1, kf_url2, kf_name1, kf_qrcode1, kf_name2, kf_qrcode2, kf_name3, kf_qrcode3, qq1, qq2, qq3, qq4, qq5, app_download_url, logo_url, start_url) VALUES(#{param.id}, #{param.name}, #{param.rollContent}, #{param.kfUrl1}, #{param.kfUrl2}, #{param.kfName1}, #{param.kfQrcode1}, #{param.kfName2}, #{param.kfQrcode2}, #{param.kfName3}, #{param.kfQrcode3}, #{param.qq1}, #{param.qq2}, #{param.qq3}, #{param.qq4}, #{param.qq5}, #{param.appDownloadUrl}, #{param.logoUrl}, #{param.startUrl})
